_header: Them that been naked give clothing
_description: On works of mercy — three couplets explicating ‘Vestire nudos…’ which is written to the left in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
Hem þat ben naked ȝif cloþingHem þat ben hungri
                    ȝef fedingMake hem beddis þat hauet nouth& visite
                    þat ben in seknesse brouthMak pes þer is wrethe an
                    fith[…]
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 22.
